import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const CalendarDaysForm = ({prevYear,prevMonth}) => { return ( <> {/* Month selector */}
« ᐊ {this.getMonthName(this.state.month)} {" " + this.state.year} ᐅ »
{/* Days grid */}
{dayNames}
{days}
) } CalendarDaysForm.propTypes = {} export default CalendarDaysForm
